      • hardwareAcceleration

        public AVAdvancedVideoOptions hardwareAcceleration(AVStreamType streamType,
                                          AVHardwareAccelerationType accelerationType)
        ‘-hwaccel[:stream_specifier] hwaccel (input,per-stream)’ Use hardware acceleration to decode the matching stream(s). This option has no effect if the selected hwaccel is not available or not supported by the chosen decoder. Note that most acceleration methods are intended for playback and will not be faster than software decoding on modern CPUs. Additionally, avconv will usually need to copy the decoded frames from the GPU memory into the system memory, resulting in further performance loss. This option is thus mainly useful for testing.

      • hardwareAcceleration

        public AVAdvancedVideoOptions hardwareAcceleration(AVStreamType streamType,
                                          String accelerationType)
